titles.title: To amend the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to reinstate an exemption with respect to the employment of individuals as State and local firefighters and law enforcement officers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Employer-Employee Relations.

committee.name: House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Amends the Age Discrimination in Employment Act of 1967 to exempt from its provisions certain bona fide hiring and retirement plans applicable to State and local fire fighters and law enforcement officers.
